modName: Dexena - new Argonian Follower NPC - neue Argonier Begleiterin
summary:
This adds a new Argonian Follower.
Her name is [color=orange]Dexena[/color] and she is located in [color=orange]Riften[/color] in [color=orange]Beeand Barb[/color].
descriptionHtml:
Update: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12729]Skyrim Special Edition version[/url]
Now also on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=213078272]Steam Workshop[/url]


--------------------------------------------
This adds a new Argonian Follower.
Her name is [color=orange]Dexena[/color] and she is located in [color=orange]Riften[/color] in [color=orange]Beeand Barb[/color].
No quest required you can just go to her and say "Follow me.".

--------------------------------------------
To install the mod just place the [b]DexenaFollower.esp[/b] and the [b]DexenaFollower.bsa[/b] file in your Skyrim Data folder.

[b]No other mods required.[/b]

[b]Recommended mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18467]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]


--------------------------------------------
[color=DeepSkyBlue][b]German:[/b][/color]
--------------------------------------------
Dieser Mod fügt eine neue Argonier Begleiterin hinzu.
Ihr Name ist [color=orange]Dexena[/color] und sie befindet sich in [color=orange]Rifton[/color] im [color=orange]Bienenstich[/color].
Es muss kein Quest gemacht werden man kann einfach zu ihr gehen und sagen "Folgt mir.".

--------------------------------------------
Um den Mod zu installieren einfach die Dateien [b]DexenaFollower.esp[/b] und [b]DexenaFollower.bsa[/b] in den Skyrim Data Ordner kopieren.

[b]Es werden keine anderen Mods benötigt.[/b]

[b]Empfohlene Mods:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18467]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
author: neoge
